text: Waco is the fourth studio album by Australian alternative rock band Violent Soho.https://itunes.apple.com/au/album/waco/id1080241055 It was released on I Oh You Records in March 2016. The album came first in the annual Triple J Top 10 albums of the year poll. At the J Awards of 2016, the album was nominated for Australian Album of the Year. == Reception == The album fared well with critics and came first in Triple Js annual album of the year poll.http://www.abc.net.au/triplej/programs/kingsmill/2016---albums-of-the- year/8697152 All six of the albums singles placed within Triple J's Hottest 100 with Like Soda reaching 15 in 2015 and How To Taste, No Shade, So Sentimental, Blanket and Viceroy reaching 92, 73, 69, 53 and 14 respectively in 2016 making Violent Soho the number one act of the year with five songs charting.http://www.abc.net.au/triplej/hottest100/16/countdown/ == Track listing == == Personnel == ===Violent Soho=== * Luke Boerdam – lead vocals, rhythm guitars * James Tidswell – lead guitars * Luke Henery – bass guitar, backing vocals * Michael Richards – drums, percussion ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Australian Albums (ARIA) | 47 |} ==Certifications== ==Accolades== |- |rowspan="5"| 2016 ||rowspan="3"| Waco || ARIA Award for Best Grouphttp://www.smh.com.au/entertainment/music/aria-award-nominations-have-a- hairy-surprise-among-the-flumes-and-avalanches-20161004-grv17p.html || |- | Best Independent Release || |- | Best Rock Album || |- | "Like Soda" || Best Video || |- | The Waco Tour || Best Australian Live Act || |- == References == Category:2016 albums Category:Violent Soho albums Category:SideOneDummy Records albums
title: Waco (album)
